org.modelio.gproject.data.project

Class DescriptorWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modelio.gproject.data.project.DescriptorWriter

  • public class DescriptorWriter
extends Object
    Serialize a ProjectDescriptor in a XML file or an OutputStream.

    The output may be encoded if the property is set.

    • Method Detail

      • write

        public void write(ProjectDescriptor d,
         Path projectFilePath)
           throws IOException
        Save the project descriptor to a file.

        Fragments URI are made relative from the project path when possible.

        Parameters:
        d - the descriptor to save
        projectFilePath - the project configuration file.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of failure.

      • write

        public void write(ProjectDescriptor d,
         OutputStream os)
           throws IOException
        Write the project descriptor to an output stream.
        Parameters:
        d - the descriptor to save
        os - the stream to write the project descriptor to.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of failure.

      • setWithScope

        public void setWithScope(boolean withScope)
        Set whether the scope is saved.

        The scope is saved by default.

        Parameters:
        withScope - true to save the scope, false to ignore it.
